name: Slate
text: It’s easy to understand why Aminatou Sow and Ann Friedman would want to smooth the rougher edges of some of their stories. https://t.co/ma2o3CQPou

name: Slate
text:
We're hiring! Slate is looking for a narrative podcast producer to join our talented team. You'll get to work on our lineup of amazing podcasts—including the award-winning Slow Burn.

Apply now: https://t.co/qguC5qNDTt
